results.title: Metformin improves depressive-like symptoms in mice via inhibition of peripheral and central NF-kappaB-NLRP3 inflammation activation.
results.text_hl: We demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alleviated @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depressive@@@-like behaviors in the chronic mild stress-induced @<m>DISEASE_Anhedonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059445 @@@anhedonia@@@ model of @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@.

citations.NLM: Du RW, Bu WG. Metformin improves depressive-like symptoms in mice via inhibition of peripheral and central NF-kappaB-NLRP3 inflammation activation. Exp Brain Res. 2020 Nov;238(11):2549-2556. PMID: 32870322
